title: Google Maps Advanced Scraper Input
description: Input schema for the advanced Google Maps scraper actor.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: List of Google Maps URLs to scrape. Leave empty to use search parameters.

search.title: Search Term
search.description: What to search for on Google Maps (e.g., 'restaurants', 'hotels', 'cafes').

searchLocation.title: Search Location
searchLocation.description: The location to search in (e.g., 'New York', 'Paris', 'Tokyo').

searchRadius.title: Search Radius (km)
searchRadius.description: Radius around coordinates to search in (only applies when coordinates are specified)
